---
output: pdf_document
params:
  player_name: "NA"
  Date: "2020-01-01"
  spray_chart: NA
  live_loc: NA
  logo_path: NA
---


```{r header_side_by_side, results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, fig.height=.65}
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)
library(jpeg)
library(here)

#read logo
logo <- jpeg::readJPEG(params$logo_path)
logo_grob <- rasterGrob(logo, interpolate = TRUE)

# Create text grob
text_grob <- textGrob(
  paste0(params$player_name, " Live BP Report\n",
         "Date: ", params$Date),
  x = 0, just = "left", gp = gpar(fontsize = 12, fontface = "bold")
)

# Arrange side by side
grid.arrange(
  text_grob, logo_grob,
  ncol = 2,
  widths = unit.c(unit(3, "null"), unit(1, "null"))
)
```


```{r live_loc, echo = FALSE, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 5}
grid::grid.draw(params$live_loc)
```


```{r spray_chart, echo = FALSE}
grid::grid.draw(params$spray_chart)
```
